instructions: Put the dinner fork on the left side of the cloth.
put the fork on the right side of the cloth with its blade facing left
put the salad fork on the cloth to the left of the dinner fork
put the salad knife on the tablecloth to the right side of the dinner knife
put the soup spoon on the cloth to the right of the salad knife
put the dessert spoon on the top of the cloth horizontally with the bowl pointing to the forks
move the dessert spoon to the right of the soup spoon and make it vertical
move the dessert spoon to the top of the cloth and make it horizontally pointing to the left
put the dinner plate on the bottom of the cloth between the forks and knives
put the bread plate to the left of the dessert spoon
put the butter knife on the top left of the bread plate pointing diagonally to the bottom left
put the wine glass on the cloth to the top of the soup spoon
put the water glass on the cloth to the left of the wine glass
put the napkin on the dinner plate
